parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions Dumitru Caragheorghe, a senatorial candidate for the DREPT party. This directly refers to a candidate participating in the elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and aims to reach a wide audience, not just a specific individual. This satisfies the "public" aspect of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's objective is to promote Dumitru Caragheorghe and his party, DREPT.  The description ("Dumitru Caragheorghe, candidat pentru Senat...") and the title ("Dumitru Caragheorghe, despre inițiativele parlamentare gândite de Partidul DREPT") clearly aim to influence voters' opinions and potentially increase votes for the candidate. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents an interview, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The framing clearly favors the candidate and promotes his views, exceeding the limits of journalistic information. This does not comply with the exception for journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional piece for a political candidate. The positive framing and clear intention to influence voters disqualify it as a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1114621856207994</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes Dumitru Caragheorghe, a senatorial candidate for the DREPT party.  The post's paid nature, its clear intention to positively influence voters' perception of the candidate, and its direct reference to the candidate and his party all strongly suggest it's electoral propaganda.  The post does not fall under any of the allowed exceptions (it's not purely journalistic, educational, or discussing non-election-related aspects of the candidate). The timing of the post (end_date suggests it's after the election period) further strengthens the case for a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Dumitru Caragheorghe</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Tomis Tv</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Tomis Tv, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1114621856207994) care promovează candidatul Dumitru Caragheorghe la Senat din partea partidului DREPT, prezentându-l într-o lumină pozitivă și având ca scop influențarea votului alegătorilor.  Postarea, prin titlu și conținut ("Dumitru Caragheorghe, candidat pentru Senat...”, "Dumitru Caragheorghe, despre inițiativele parlamentare gândite de Partidul DREPT"), depășește limitele activității jurnalistice obiective, constituind material de propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. Efectul electoral este clar, vizând creșterea popularității și a numărului de voturi pentru candidatul menționat.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
